or you could link it to /dev/null
you need to read man ln
but to start the command is like this --> ln -s /dev/null /path/to/document/root
Oops wrong... try this --> ln -s /path/to/document/root /dev/null
Oops double Oops
Oops double Oops --> Sorry REALLY wrong
don't do that... it will wreck your web server
try ln -s /path/to/document/root/favicon.ico /dev/null
now that should link favicon.ico to /dev/null which should stop your problem
